name: MDMA
description: TRAM is short for Typographic Rythm Automation Machine. TRAM is a general purpose midi controller.

scripts.build_all: electron-packager . TRAM --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --out ../builds --overwrite --icon=icons/icon.icns ; electron-packager . TRAM --platform=win32  --arch=x64 --out ../builds --overwrite --icon=icons/icon.ico ; echo 'Built for all OS'

author: Johannes Hassenstein
